summary: This is an email from the DOJ's voicemail system forwarding a voice message to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims notification list. The email indicates a voice message was left on August 7, 2019, and was forwarded to the victims' notification group.

persons.name: Postmaster
persons.context: The sender of the email from the DOJ's voicemail system, responsible for forwarding the attached voice message.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Epstein Victims Notification
events.description: A voice message was received and forwarded via email to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims notification list.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York maintained an email distribution list (USANYS.EpsteinVictims@usa.doj.gov) for communicating with Epstein victims.
A voice message was left on August 7, 2019, and was forwarded to this victims notification list via email.
The document shows the DOJ's internal communication system (voip.usa.doj.gov) was used to manage victim communications.
